db:abstract.db:para: The Text Edit example shows Qt's rich text editing facilities in action.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets qtHaveModule(printsupport): QT += printsupport
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = textedit
HEADERS = textedit.h SOURCES = textedit.cpp \ main.cpp
RESOURCES += textedit.qrc build_all:!build_pass { CONFIG -= build_all CONFIG += release }
EXAMPLE_FILES = textedit.qdoc
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/richtext/textedit INSTALLS += target
